ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] First time player
ygData.msgSnippet: Most likley playing the game to his enjoyment. I personally envy him for not being a TWINK and powerleveling just to say he is at high level. Plus he gave a
ygData.messageBody:
Most likley playing the game to his enjoyment.
I personally envy him for not being a TWINK and
powerleveling just to say he is at high level.

Plus he gave a newbiw Excellent advice.


--- David Langille <tuxedomystery2000@...>
wrote:
>
>
> wrote:
> > Welcome to EQ! Your life will never be the same.
> > Having never played a
> > Pally, here are some general thoughts:
> >
> > #1 DOn't feel rushed to get your first character
> up
> > to higher levels. EQ is
> > a huge place and there is so much to do and see.
> If
> > you take your time you
> > will have a much better experience, IMHO! (I
> played
> > my Ranger for a year
> > and he only reached 27).
>
> Ok, and how often did you play? and and what really
> took you that long?
>
> Honestly man, what were you doing all that time?
>
